creditline: Gift of Virginia Stromquist in memory of her parents
description: little girl doll with 'sleepy' eyes; long brown curled wig with white bow on PR side; composition body with hinged joints at shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips and knees; wears white undershirt, pantaloons and stockings, green dress, green and white pinafore and black shoes
dimension: H.22 x W.9-3/4 x D.5-1/4 in. (clothed)
medium: bisque porcelain, composition body, mohair, cloth
title: Female Doll
